A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you want solid evidence that this website and critics have been bought and paid for by Disney\, look no further than the Last Jedi. Look at the disparity between the critic and audience score. The film was excruciatingly bad. It essentially mocks the mythos of Star Wars\, turns Luke into a jerk\, and anything that was not horrible was a rehash from previous Star Wars that did it far better. Phantom Menace at least had Darth Maul. There is nothing redeeming about this film. It ruined any intrigue set up in the Force Awakens. You have been warned.
